CustomField.description: This field indicates the Province Toll Free Number that a claimant should use. If the Case Owner's Country is "US", the corresponding phone number is 1-800-433-2811. If the Case Owner's Country is in Canada, it checks if the Province is West or East. If it's West, the phone number is 1-800-521-8484. Otherwise, they should call 1-800-361-5836 for East.(Added decra in the formula field CLAIMSV2-880)
CustomField.formula:
CASE(Conga_Service_Region__c, 'US', $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.US_Toll_Free__c, 'Western Canada', $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.Western_Canada_Toll_Free__c, 'Eastern Canada', $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.Eastern_Canada_Toll_Free__c, 'Decra', $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.Decra_Toll_Free__c, null)
/* IF( ISPICKVAL(Sector__c, "Decra"), 'Decra', IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode , "US"), ISPICKVAL(Sector__c, "US") ), $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.US_Toll_Free__c , IF(AND( ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingCountryCode , "CA"), OR ( ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "AB"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "BC"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "SK"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "NT"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "YT"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "NU"), ISPICKVAL(Account.BillingStateCode, "MB") ) ), , $Setup.Warranty_Claims_Defaults__c.Eastern_Canada_Toll_Free__c ) ) ) */
CustomField.label: Conga Toll Free Number
